## Description {#details}

Helper to linearize a matrix expression tree into a string.

Currently matrix expressions are linarized by starting at an expression leaf and linearizing bottom up.

Definition at line 2216 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/lowermatrixintrinsics-cpp">LowerMatrixIntrinsics.cpp</a>.
